Text: Expertly done!
I am not so easily broken.
I sense something amiss. Quickly, to me!
A test of my will and training both. Hold fast, everyone!
Well done, Gosetsu. Now, I believe it is past time we put Minato's soul to rest.
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Are you all right?
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Hold on!
Defeat Izanami
Prove your strength to Venat!
Let neither side hold back.
Impressive... I shall have to try something different.
I see you won't be easily overcome...but neither will I.
We've only just begun. Come at me with your all!
My blade sings!
There!
Have a taste!
No quarter!
Prepare yourself!
Very well, let us move to the final trial.
Break your chains, shed your burdens─and show me your strength of will!
You still stand. The people of your time are more resilient than I had dared hope.
I have seen enough.
Defeat Hesperos
I have awaited this moment... Witness the full measure of a hemitheos's power!
There is but one master in Asphodelos!
These halls are <Italic>1</Italic>my<Italic>0</Italic> domain!
If you insist upon this folly, then you must face the full extent of my authority!
I shall feast upon your aether!
Your aether turns...and by it shall you be undone!
A rat in a maze is amusing at first, but it is still a rat─vermin to be disposed of.
Scurry, vermin, ere my blade finds your bellies...
This chlamys is no mere affectation, I assure you!
For trespass in my domain shall you be judged!
Do not believe victory yours... I can yet shed this meager form and usher you back to the star!
To him do I dedicate this transformation─this victory!
Power courses through me! And you... You will feed my subjects!
A tragedy unfolds within the halls of Asphodelos. Rejoice, for you are its star!
And the final act begins! Bring your adoring fans to tears!
To those who endured every tragic turn, stand at attention for the curtain call!
A tragedy demands death. Discard your delusions of salvation and embrace catharsis!
'Tis said that there are no ifs in history, yet man is wont to dream. Let us dream, then, of a future where a dear comrade lived...
Your feeble light shall fade before my brilliance!
Undone by mortal will. Whither now...?
O Ascalon! Drink deep of the power of slumbering gods!
Y-You survived my divine reckoning!? Impossible!
This is the power of Light? No... If I must fall, then so shall you!
Thy final verse is sung!

Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!
Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!
I swore to Shiva─swore that I would not take the lives of men... Stop me, I prithee!
I thank thee, servant of Hydaelyn... Now I may go to be with my beloved...
Thus did one song draw to a close. But here and now, this minstrel shall perform another─a song of imagination transcending...
At long last, this flesh belongeth to me! And now, wicked mortals─my dirge shall usher you unto your doom!
Hahahaha! By the power of mine enemy's eyes, I am become a god eternal!
O Ascalon! Purge the tainted with the light of sorrow immeasurable!
O Ascalon! Consign the wicked with the light of rancor unquenchable!
O Ascalon! Scorch the earth with the light of regret unfathomable!
Your time is come! Eyes of mine enemy, bring oblivion unto the unbelievers!
Dragonsong War Progress
Alternate Dragonsong War Progress

In pursuit of the archbishop, the Warrior of Light journeyed to Azys Lla, where <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> confronted a primal born of the power of the Eye: King Thordan and his knights twelve.

Though <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> emerged victorious, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> comrade's body was claimed by Nidhogg, who brought his unbridled rage to bear against Ishgard.
A single life can alter the course of history... Enslaved by an ancient relic, the great wyrm Hraesvelgr descended upon Ishgard at his vengeful brother's side.
Thus did a dreadful new divinity arise─one endowed with the nigh-irrepressible life force of two great wyrms...
Tell me, Warrior of Light. How do you propose to end this conflict?
If you believe that eliminating me will undo a thousand years of strife and suffering, then you are a fool.
It should go without saying, but stay on your guard. There was quite the menagerie of horrors when last I was here.
They're upon us! To arms!
Merlwyb and I shall hold them off. Press on, my friends!
A persistent lot, aren't they?
I shall hold the line here. When you see an opening, take it, and do not look back!
Nerva never did make things easy. Let's get this over with.
More are coming! Stay sharp!
There is no end to them...
Careful there, Leveilleur. They have their sights set on you.
I will see to the rabble. You focus on the large one there.
Very well. With me, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
This ends here, Nerva. For Garlemald, her people, and all who call this star home!
Blasphemy or no, I'll not suffer anyone who gets in my way!
For glory...everlasting. For Garlemald!
Hold on, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
We must take the offensive!
To me... My legion!
We will be overrun at this rate...
Bring them here, and leave the rest to me.
Dammit, how could that have missed!? No matter, we will deal with them easily enough.
Behind me, quickly! I shall take the brunt of it!
We must...drive it back!
\\<pant> \\<pant> Gods be good...
We've come too far...to give up now...
Then let's put an end to this, shall we?
No! Garlemald...is mine! MINE!!!
No, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Are you all right?
Get a hold of yourself, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If>! We've a monster to slay!
Reach the top of the Tower of Babil!
Defeat Nerva's minions!
Defeat Nerva yae Galvus!
Arrive at the undersea entrance
Clear the undersea entrance
Arrive at the Threshold of Bounty
Clear the Threshold of Bounty
Arrive at Weaver's Warding
Defeat the Kapikulu

Unrecognized aetherial signature...
Brazen thief! You will proceed no further!
Turn back, treasure seeker, or this vault will be your tomb.
Your greed will prove your undoing...

Warning. This vault is under my protection.
Failure to withdraw will invite chastisement.

Spin and fumble!
Stumble and fall!

Leave now, and live.
This is your final warning.

Willful trespass confirmed.
You have chosen...death.
All intruders will be slain!

Glyph of passage detected.
Confirming bearer's identity...
I have taken the liberty of preparing an <Italic>1</Italic>electrifying<Italic>0</Italic> stage for you.
Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <Italic>1</Italic>handful<Italic>0</Italic>.
I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!
\\<pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!
Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.
Impressive! Now it is <Italic>1</Italic>my<Italic>0</Italic> turn!
Know your place!
Come, we shall see if you can finish what you have started.
Eorzea is mine by right!
That you should still stand... Very well, then!
Arrive at the command chamber
Clear the command chamber
Arrive at the Laboratorium Primum
Clear the Laboratorium Primum
Arrive on the Echelon
Defeat Gaius van Baelsar
Right, I'll examine the equipment for intelligence. Press on─I'll let you know if I learn anything.
Well, well, would you look at this! It's the armor we borrowed for our mission at Castrum Centri!
If this isn't fate, I don't know what is! Go on, strap yourself in and raise hells!
If you will not yield, then you will be destroyed!
We need to make our way down. There ought to be a terminal for the lift up ahead.
Here it is. If you'd care to take the van, I'll follow after I've had a look around.
Clear Ingenuity's Foothold
Clear the Path
Clear the Monument to Destruction
Clear the Endless City
Clear the Circle of Inquiry
Clear the Twin Halls
The Builder has been made to yield...
Intriguing. Then the Destroyer shall take your measure...
...After you have provided my servant with some sport.
In the name of the Destroyer, I will lay you low.
My divine axe will rend you in twain!
Come, show me the strength of mankind!
Upon the ground you shall crawl!
By my authority as the Destroyer...
I will break you body and soul!
Wandering star, descend and destroy!
Keep a reverent distance!
Bask in my blinding resplendence!
Can you predict your own undoing?
Most impressive, children of man...
A domain aspected to lightning... Byregot is here, I shouldn't doubt.
The mechanical spire ahead could have been plucked straight out of legend!
That you should best a divinity... I couldn't have asked for better help!
So the gods have minions at their beck and call... We must proceed with care.
Rhalgr isn't known as the god of destruction without reason. Steel yourself.
Ahead stands a statue I have fashioned for our contest.
Come, mortals. Enter my realm─if you dare.
Another domain─one aspected to fire...
Then the voice that called out to us...
Mere minions are no match for you, 'twould seem.
A divinity awaits us beyond. Have care.
Look how the sky has changed! The result of your victory over Azeyma, I daresay...
There's a city up ahead... Could there be people here?
Prepare to be judged, children of man.
Ashes you will be.
Will you weather my trial?
We have only just begun!
The flames of the abyss consume all.
Bitterest suffering awaits.
From ashes you came, to ashes you will return.
Still you defy our divine authority.
Very well. Let us proceed to your judgment.
We, the Traders, shall weigh your souls!
Preserve the balance if you can.
5 seconds to Balance.
4 seconds to Balance.
3 seconds...
2 seconds...
1 second...
Once more─and once more only─we shall weigh your souls.
Preserve the balance.
The moment of judgment is come.
You have been found wanting.
You shall wander in purgatory for eternity.
You have passed our judgment...
Well done! You are deserving of reward!
Man's tenacity is a sight to behold!
As a show of esteem, we shall bring our all to bear.
Hahaha! Such vim and vigor!
So this is the spirit of man...
You shall bear witness to our might...
But will you be able to comprehend it?

That mortals should set foot in our divine realm...
Come, we shall see whether you are fit to remain!
So, you are resolved to face me.
By my power shall a new world be forged.
Come, children of man!
Scatter!
Tremble before my divinity!
Behold the virtuosity of the Builder!
Behold the works of a god!
To me, O hammer divine!
Searing light, smite my foes!
The thunder is mine to command!
If you would halt our ascension, then press on...
Witness the glory of the divine!
Bend the knee!
'Tis too late to beg mercy!
You will be scoured by the light of the Sun!
O crimson fan, in fire woven...
In your wake leave naught uncleansed!
Is it just a mirage...or something more?
Hahaha! I've quite warmed to you!
An explosive finish!
Let there be fire!
Raging flames, dance upon the wind!
None can escape the inferno!
This will burn!
A gift of flame for our children!
